testCase.name: Overlay - Is not displayed if not open
useOnUnmount - calls the passed in function when the component unmounts
PostDetails - does not display post info if no data comes back from the API
PostDetails - displays post info if it comes back from the API
getIsApiLoading - returns true if the api is loading
getIsApiLoading - returns false if the api is not loading
postsSelectors - selectPosts returns an array of posts
postsSelectors - selectIsGetPostsLoading returns false if not loading
postsSlice - getPosts - should handle pending properly
postsSlice - getPosts - should handle fulfilled properly
postsSlice - getPosts - should handle rejected properly
postsApiSelectors - returns true if the posts api is loading
